verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>defeated,<s%> and whose <S%H776>land<s%> they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise,<s%> <S%H8121><s%> from the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> to the east: <S%H4217><s%>

<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> [and] <S%H4910>ruled<s%> from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> both the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H3220>Sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> [even] the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> Beth-jeshimoth, and on the <S%H8486>south,<s%> at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of the <S%H794>slopes<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> one of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and at <S%H154>Edrei,<s%>

and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> and <S%H5548>Salecah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maacathites,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> [as far as] the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west,<s%> from Baal-gad in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak,<s%> which <S%H5927>rises<s%> toward <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions,<s%>

in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> in the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> on the <S%H794>slopes,<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and in the <S%H5045>Negev;<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>
the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> in the <S%H9338>heights<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%>
